short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AnswerSync is a browser extension study tool that enhances practice tests directly in your LMS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AnswerSync is a browser extension study tool that lets you combine the instant gratification of flashcards with the relevance and grading system of practice tests. Using AnswerSync, you can see the correct answers on practice tests integrated directly into their LMS. Additionally, after submitting practice tests, you can go see the questions and answers in a flashcard format in your AnswerSync Dashboard. Currently the only supported LMS in Canvas LMS.
